message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $120. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can offer you $100 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $100 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $110?
Hello Alice, I understand your position. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose $105 as my counteroffer. I hope this aligns better with what you're considering.
